description:
Would you like to get your message out to your ideal client? What if you could do that with no marketing or advertising dollars? What if you could solve problems, answer questions and offer value to others through email? How would that feel?

This training course consists of  3 video lessons, showing you how to overcome procrastination, build an email list and create an opt-in offer in your business to increase profits.  I will share my list building experiences, strategies and tactics with you.  

At the end of this course you will be able to build a list even if you don't have a website.  Now before you start taking this course, be sure to sign up for a free MailChimp account!

This is a BEGINNER class that covers the following:
* The Importance of building an email list
* How to build an email list without a website
* Effective communication and consistency
* How to solve your ideal clients problems
* How to get your clients to talk to you
* How to create a custom link
* Review an email template
* The best FREE offer.

title: How to Build an Email List without a Website
